data.title: Office of Administrative Services
data.meta_description: Browse through over 100 affordable associates degrees San Bruno CA offers at Skyline College. Earn your two year associates degree from Skyline College today!
data.text:
The Office of Administrative Services provides an array of support functions to establish and provide premier business services including the accountability, organization and administration of the fiscal, human resource and business operations to support the college in meeting its mission, vision, values, goals and institutional student learning outcomes.

Administrative Services provides oversight and support for the Collegeâ€™s business activities and operations on campus including:

Budget and Finance

Human Resources

Facilities Management and Capital Improvements

Grants and Categorical Programs

Procurement

Cashiering

Shipping and Receiving

Evening Services
